```{r}
bias = seq(0.1,0.9,by = 0.1)

precision = seq(5,10,by = 5)


bias = expand.grid(bias = bias, precision = precision)

bias$id = 1:nrow(bias)

data_list <- split(bias, bias$id)

plan(multisession, workers = 60)

results = future_map(data_list, ~simple_bayes(.x, 100))


df = map_dfr(results, bind_rows)



df$source22 = as.factor(df$source22)

df$source222 = df$source2/9

df %>% ggplot(aes(x = source1, y = outcome, col = as.factor(source22), group = source22))+geom_line(position = "dodge")+facet_grid(precision~bias)+theme_classic()



```
